In: This idea involves using drones equipped with pollen collectors to pollinate plants. The drones would fly over the plants and collect pollen from one flower and transfer it to another flower. This idea has a confidence score of 0.8.
Human intervention: In this idea, humans would manually pollinate plants by collecting pollen from one flower and transferring it to another flower. This idea has a confidence score of 0.6.
Pollinator-: This idea involves breeding a new species of pollinator that is capable of pollinating plants. This idea has a confidence score of 0.5.
Artificial pollination: In this idea, artificial methods such as the use of wind turbines or electric fans would be used to pollinate plants. This idea has a confidence score of 0.4.

Hydroponic pollination: This idea involves growing plants in hydroponic systems, where the plants are grown in nutrient-rich water without soil. In this system, pollination can be done manually or with the help of pollen collectors. This idea has a confidence score of 0.7.
